channel.title: I want to put the silabsoft client on my website
channel.description: this is for my server, i am wondering how you can put the silabsoft client on my own website.

item.title: I want to put the silabsoft client on my website
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

thats a waste of time, if your talking about running the client from your own computer, just make a link to the proper silabclient from your site, ill even get you started

Play

if you dont no how to use that, you can either add a paragraph or a navagation bar, and have that link on it.
for example

To play the game please click Play

^^ that will display as To play the game please click [u]play[/u]

but obviously you will be able to click the play link and it will load the silabclient

Read full topic
item.source: I want to put the silabsoft client on my website
